attributes.action: Offer his full backing and support to save the vital work that the Scrine foundation carries out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A vital Kent based homelessness charity is threatened with closure because the local council wants to cut our housing benefit funding on the basis that we do not offer enough support to the most vulnerable people in society, which is in total naive and frankly wrong assessment of the vital work we carry out.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
